meanings.definition: Of or relating to a cone.
meanings.sent1: The conic shape of the party hat made it perfect for the celebration.
meanings.sent2: The ice cream cone had a conic form that made it easy to hold.
meanings.sent3: The conic design of the spaceship made it look like a futuristic rocket.
meanings.sent4: Her conic hairstyle resembled a perfectly sculpted cone.
meanings.sent5: The conic shadow cast by the streetlight looked like a giant cone on the ground.

meanings.definition: A curve formed by the intersection of a plane with a right circular cone.
meanings.sent1: The conic on the math test was challenging for the students to solve.
meanings.sent2: She studied the conic carefully to understand its properties.
meanings.sent3: The conic on the chalkboard seemed to dance as the teacher explained it.
meanings.sent4: The conic in the geometry book was illustrated with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The conic traced by the laser pointer on the screen mesmerized the audience.
